title: [Path to Enlightenment]
description: Lining the path, rows of yellow flowers shine brightly in the light as a flurry of bees dart about amongst them.  As you watch the flurry of activity, your eyes are drawn to a rose covered trellis.  Resting against it, you see a long wing tipped staff.

Rows of flowers lining the path are bright in the moonlight against their dark foliage.  Moths wheel and flutter about a rose covered trellis, drawing your eye there.  You see a long wing tipped staff resting against the trellis.
